dt: {bc}any of numerous small bright-colored oscine birds (especially genera {it}Cyanerpes{/it} and {it}Chlorophanes{/it} of the family Coerebidae) of tropical America
{bc}any of a family (Drepanididae) of often colorful oscine birds found only in Hawaii

shortdef: any of numerous small bright-colored oscine birds (especially genera Cyanerpes and Chlorophanes of the family Coerebidae) of tropical America
any of a family (Drepanididae) of often colorful oscine birds found only in Hawaii
